54. AI-Driven Quality Control: Mastermind_AI is designed to provide advanced quality control capabilities to ensure product quality:
    * Quality Inspection: Developing quality inspection techniques that enable the AI system to inspect products and detect defects.
    * Quality Testing: Implementing quality testing techniques that enable the AI system to test products and detect defects.
